description: Data Transfer Object (DTO) class 'NoteResponse' used for returning note data in API responses within a notes application backend.

classes.name: NoteResponse
classes.description: DTO class representing the response object for note data in the API, including fields for id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt.

methods.name: NoteResponse()
methods.description: Default constructor for the NoteResponse class.

methods.name: NoteResponse(Long id, String title, String content, OffsetDateTime createdAt, OffsetDateTime updatedAt)
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for initializing a NoteResponse object with specific note data.

methods.name: getId()
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the note.

methods.name: setId(Long id)
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier of the note.

methods.name: getTitle()
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle(String title)
methods.description: Sets the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent()
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent(String content)
methods.description: Sets the content of the note.

methods.name: getCreatedAt()
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the note.

methods.name: setCreatedAt(OffsetDateTime createdAt)
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp of the note.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt()
methods.description: Returns the last updated timestamp of the note.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt(OffsetDateTime updatedAt)
methods.description: Sets the last updated timestamp of the note.
